description: Get a specific invoice for an organization

parameters.description: struct for passing parameters to the method [`cockroach_cloud_get_invoice`]

invoice_id.description: invoice_id is the unique ID representing the invoice. invoice_id is used to retrieve a specific billing period's invoice.

parameters.title: CockroachCloudGetInvoiceParams

title: cockroachdb_cockroach_cloud_get_invoice
